page.title: 17COLWYN BAY MATERNITY HOME
page.content: The maternity home is situated in Nant_y_Glyn Road and has served the community for over{forty years.}In the past most mothers gave{birth}there.The record number of babies born in one year at the home was in 1961 when there were 419 births.However,over recent years the vast majority of mothers have delivered their babies in the general hospitals at St.Asaph or Bangor,{transferring}to Nant_y_Glyn 24 hours later. Mothers spend four to six days at the home caring for their babies and getting to{know}them.By the time that they go home the mothers are well {rested}and far better equipped to cope with a new baby. The home also provides an{antenatal service which consists of both clinics and classes. Unfortunately this home is due to{close}later this year.
